body:
Will the image posts I've already made fade away like in Back to the Future?

As I've just crossed the threshold, let's find out. If you downvote my comments below I'll tell you what happens.

### Result:
- Image posting privileges DO get revoked < 1000 reputs.
- Existing images do not vanish like in Back to the Future.
- Stop
body_html:
Will the image posts I've already made fade away like in Back to the Future?

As I've just crossed the threshold, let's find out. If you downvote my comments below I'll tell you what happens.

Result:

  • Image posting privileges DO get revoked < 1000 reputs.
  • Existing images do not vanish like in Back to the Future.
  • Stop
title: Ruqqus science experiment: will I keep my image posting privileges if my rep falls < 1000?

guild.description:
The official guild for all things Ruqqus.

Rules:

💻 No promotion of other sites that aren't a fork of Ruqqus

🟪 Ruqqus-related only. This is a community dedicated to Ruqqus meta discussion. Content may involve technology and politics but must have ample context in Ruqqus.

📬 No spamming. Spamming comments or posts is not allowed.

😀 Be civil. Be nice. Harassment, trolling, and disruptive behavior is not allowed. Basically, don’t be a jerk.

📜 Follow Ruqqus ToS. This is a given.

For press releases, visit +RuqqusPress.

For updates and patch notes, visit +changelog.

For ideas and feedback, visit +BetaFeedback

For bug reports, visit +RuqqusBugs

author.bio:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.

body: I don't agree with this. I think once your rep hits a certain threshold you should retain eligibility, even if you get downvote brigaded afterwards.
body_html: I don't agree with this. I think once your rep hits a certain threshold you should retain eligibility, even if you get downvote brigaded afterwards.
